Class BaseConfig

java.lang.Object
testBase.BaseConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
HomeModuleTest, MemberModuleTest
public class BaseConfig extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseConfig

      public BaseConfig()

  • Method Details

    • suiteConfig

      @BeforeSuite public void suiteConfig()
      Initializes the WebDriver and launches the application before the test suite starts.

    • testConfig

      @BeforeTest public void testConfig()
      Configures the test environment before each test. Initializes the SoftAssert instance for use in tests.

    • classConfig

      @BeforeClass public void classConfig()
      Initializes the page objects before any test methods are executed. This method is called once before the test class is run.

    • groupConfig

      @BeforeGroups public void groupConfig()
      Configures the test environment before each group of tests. This method can be used to set up any group-specific configurations.

    • methodConfig

      @BeforeMethod public void methodConfig()
      Configures the test environment before each test method. This method is called before each test method is executed. It logs in the user using the credentials from the PropertyConfig.

    • postMethodConfig

      @AfterMethod public void postMethodConfig()
      Cleans up the test environment after each test method. This method logs out the user after each test method is executed.

    • postGroupConfig

      @AfterGroups public void postGroupConfig()
      Cleans up the test environment after all tests in the class have been executed. This method can be used to perform any necessary cleanup after the test class.

    • postClassConfig

      @AfterClass public void postClassConfig()
      Cleans up the test environment after all tests in the suite have been executed. This method can be used to perform any necessary cleanup after the entire test suite.

    • postTestConfig

      @AfterTest public void postTestConfig()
      Cleans up the test environment after all tests in the suite have been executed. This method can be used to perform any necessary cleanup after the entire test suite.

    • postSuiteConfig

      @AfterSuite(alwaysRun=true) public void postSuiteConfig()
      Cleans up the test environment after the entire test suite has been executed. This method quits the WebDriver instance to release resources.
